title: Great 1 Bed, 1 Bath floor plans at Essex Apartments
posting_body: ['Essex Apartments', 'Bedroom: 1 | Bathroom: 1', 'Square Footage: 824 sq ft', 'Monthly Rent: $2505 - $3201', '(844) 800-3206', 'Community Description', 'YES, WE ARE OPEN!', 'CALL NOW TO SCHEDULE AN IN-PERSON TOUR!', 'OR LET US SHOW YOU THROUGH FACETIME!', 'Essex Apartments is a luxury apartment complex located in Peabody, MA offering one and two bedroom apartments.', 'We offer multiple amenities available to residents including a beautiful fitness center, sparkling pool with a sundeck, and a landscape barbeque patio!', 'If you are interested in a 1 or 2 apartment we encourage you to check out our floor plans or contact our leasing office for more information.', 'Community Amenities', '❖ 10 Minutes From the Coastline', '❖ 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance', '❖ Close '❖ Free WiFi Available in Common Areas', '❖ Located Near Public Transportation', '❖ Smart Rain Sensors Used to Reduce Water Consumption', '❖ Sparkling Swimming Pool with Sundeck', '❖ State-of-the-Art
